programme.title: Victor Crowley (2018)
programme.desc: Adam, the lone survivor of the 2007 massacre at Louisiana's Honey Island Swamp ends up back at the scene of the crime 10 years later and finds himself face to face with a reanimated Victor Crowley. Fourth entry in the “Hatchet” slasher-horror series(n)

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels (2010)
programme.desc: A mail-room worker finds himself on the adventure of a lifetime after being shipwrecked on a fantastical island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison, in this modern take on the classic tale by Jonathan Swift(n)

programme.title: Beyond Borders (2003)
programme.desc: A married socialite (Angelina Jolie) leaves a pampered life in England to join a relief group run by a renegade doctor (Clive Owen). Good intentions are sunk by a sappy romance. Noah Emmerich, Teri Polo, Linus Roache. Directed by Martin Campbell(n)

programme.title: The Abyss (1989)
programme.desc: Deep-sea rescue divers are plagued by a mysterious force while probing a nuclear submarine crash. Meanwhile, the crew suspect the accident was caused by an extraterrestrial craft, and that they may be participating in an encounter with an alien species(n)

programme.title: Kiss of Death (1995)
programme.desc: To win an early release, a convict agrees to go undercover to help a DA gather incriminating evidence on a crime boss(n)

programme.title: Arizona (2018)
programme.desc: During the housing crisis in 2009, an Arizona realtor named Cassie is confronted by a murderous former client whom she convinced to mortgage an overpriced McMansion. Hellbent on making people pay for his unhappiness, he kidnaps Cassie and her daughter and ropes them into his frantic revenge fantasy(n)

programme.title: MacGruber (2010)
programme.desc: In this action-comedy, oddball soldier of fortune MacGruber (Will Forte) returns to the field for the first time since his wife was killed after his old nemesis (Val Kilmer) steals a nuclear weapon. Partnered with a pair of new assistants, the clueless man of action must track down the bad guy before it's too late. Directed by Jorma Taccone(n)

programme.title: Another Stakeout (1993)
programme.desc: Seattle investigators are affiliated with an assistant DA to find a missing government witness(n)

programme.title: The House (2017)
programme.desc: After realizing that they can't possibly afford the tuition for their daughter's college, a married couple team up with their eccentric neighbor to make money by running an illegal casino in the suburbs. Needless to say, things quickly spiral out of control as they deal with unruly guests while trying to keep their operation hidden from the police(n)

programme.title: Lost in America (1985)
programme.desc: A midlife crisis prompts a yuppie couple to quit their jobs and take to the road in a Winnebago(n)

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies (1993)
programme.desc: Jed Clampett makes millions after striking oil in Arkansas, and moves his family to Beverly Hills. As he strives to turn his daughter into a sophisticated woman, his decision to remarry opens him up to some greedy schemers associated with his kowtowing banker, Mr. Drysdale(n)

programme.title: Master Of The Shadowless Kick: Wong Kei-ying (2016)
programme.desc: A physician, Wong Kei-ying, learns the legendary martial art Shadowless Kick, to take down the ruthless and treacherous new governor of Canton who runs the opium trade(n)

programme.title: The Fourth Kind (2009)
programme.desc: An Alaskan psychotherapist uncovers irrefutable evidence that aliens are abducting humans during sessions with her patients(n)

programme.title: The Fourth Kind (2009)
programme.desc: An Alaskan psychotherapist uncovers irrefutable evidence that aliens are abducting humans during sessions with her patients(n)

programme.title: Legend (2015)
programme.desc: This thriller follows the rise and fall of Ronald and Reginald Kray, identical twin gangsters who built a criminal empire in London during the 1950s and '60s using gruesome, unhinged tactics and savvy business acumen(n)

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank (1997)
programme.desc: A successful hit man re-evaluates his profession while attending his high-school reunion(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich (1999)
programme.desc: Craig Schwartz (John Cusak) is hard-up financially and ends up accepting a job as a file clerk in a mediocre company on the 7th floor in the center of a building. One day, behind some filing cabinets, he finds a corridor that leads into the mind of actor John Malkovich (played by himself). Amazed at the discovery, the frustrated clerk tries to talk his workmate, Maxine (Catherine Keener), into making some money by charging a fee to whoever wants to be John Malkovich by spending fifteen minutes inside the actor's head. The film was directed by the renowned video-clip director, Spike Jonze, and features also the performance of Cameron Diaz -completely transformed to play Craig's wife. Being John Malkovich obtained three Oscar® nominations, for best director, best original screenplay, and best supporting actress (Catherine Keener), and four Golden Globe nominations - best film, best screenplay, best supporting actress (Catherine Keener and Cameron Diaz)(n)

programme.title: Conviction (2010)
programme.desc: A Massachusetts wife and mother (Hilary Swank) dedicates her life to becoming a lawyer in the hope of exonerating her imprisoned brother (Sam Rockwell), whom she believes was wrongfully convicted of a murder(n)

programme.title: Black Swan (2010)
programme.desc: Ballet dancer Nina (Natalie Portman) experiences traumatic hallucinations as she pushes her body to the limit in order to win the lead role in a production of "Swan Lake." Meanwhile, she must also deal with competition from a rival dancer and the sexual advances of the ballet company's director(n)

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express (2017)
programme.desc: In 1930s Europe, legendary detective Hercule Poirot probes a murder that occurs aboard the Orient Express. As the thirteen passengers grow paranoid that the killer will strike again, Poirot realizes there's more to the case than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: The 33 (2015)
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses(n)

programme.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017)
programme.desc: Frustrated with the lack of progress by the local police in finding those responsible for the brutal murder of her daughter, a mother installs three controversial billboards on the edge of town to goad the department into action(n)

programme.title: The Big Boss (1971)
programme.desc: A worker who has sworn off violence defends his colleagues against their drug-smuggling, murderous employers(n)

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: With Dennis Quaid and Billy Bob Thornton in the cast, this historical drama features magnificent war scenes as it reconstructs the revolution over the independence of Texas, in 1836 –before, during and after the construction of the Alamo (a fort built by Spanish missionaries to catechize the natives). Texans and Tejanos (born in Mexico), led by William Travis, Davy Crockett (Thornton) and Jim Bowie, are besieged by an army commanded by Mexican dictator Antonio Lopez de Santa Ana. Later, however, the outcome of the battle of San Jacinto, under General Sam Houston (Dennis Quaid), is the defeat of the Santa Ana men, which finally leads to the independence of the state(n)

programme.title: Lottery Ticket (2010)
programme.desc: A young man (Bow Wow) in the projects has a lottery ticket worth $370 million, but he must stay hidden from moochers and local thugs for a few days until he can get to the lottery office and collect his winnings. While lying low, he relies on help from his best friend and a mysterious retired boxer(n)

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key (2018)
programme.desc: In the fourth installment in the "Insidious" series, parapsychologist Elise Rainier must delve even deeper into the infernal world known as "the Further" when supernatural forces target her own family(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon (2016)
programme.desc: In 1964 San Francisco, a pre-fame Bruce Lee challenges a Shaolin monk named Wong Jack Man to a fight behind closed doors. This drama depicts this real-life event, which helped cement Lee's reputation as one of the greatest martial artists of all time(n)

programme.title: Victory (1981)
programme.desc: John Huston-coached soccer match---Allied POWs led by Michael Caine and Sylvester Stallone vs. Nazi commandant Max von Sydow's German squad---during WWII. Professional soccer greats Pele, Bobby Moore and Osvaldo Ardiles add authenticity(n)

programme.title: Truth or Dare (2018)
programme.desc: An innocuous game among friends turns into a fight for survival when a group of friends playing "Truth or Dare" are mysteriously killed if they don't carry out the dare or say the truth. Now, the remaining players must find the person who started the twisted game before it is their turn to die(n)

programme.title: The Newton Boys (1998)
programme.desc: A biopic about the Newton brothers (Matthew McConaughey, Skeet Ulrich, Vincent D'Onofrio, Ethan Hawke), who robbed more than 80 banks during the 1920s. Louise: Julianna Margulies. Brentwood Glasscock: Dwight Yoakam. Written and directed by Richard Linklater(n)

programme.title: Holy Man (1998)
programme.desc: Unholy mess about a spiritual mystery man named G. (Eddie Murphy) who is exploited by an ambitious TV producer (Jeff Goldblum) to boost ratings at a home-shopping channel. Kate: Kelly Preston. McBainbridge: Robert Loggia. Barry: Jon Cryer. Directed by Stephen Herek(n)

programme.title: Barbershop (2002)
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this comedy-drama about a day in the life of those who work and chill at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cedric the Entertainer stars as an opinionated barber who spends more time cracking jokes than cutting hair(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown (2015)
programme.desc: After returning to duty, a haunted police officer finds evidence that incriminates several of his colleagues. As a result, the corrupt cops attempt to silence him in order to save their careers(n)

programme.title: Machete (2010)
programme.desc: Former Mexican federale Machete seeks vengeance against corrupt U.S. politicians after being set up during a high-profile assassination attempt on an American senator. With the help of his friends, Machete aims to hit the puppet masters where it hurts, but first he'll have to contend with blade-wielding ICE agent Sartana, who's been tracking his every move(n)

programme.title: Wishmaster (1997)
programme.desc: A gemologist unwittingly releases an evil genie from a precious stone, then tries to foil his quest for world domination(n)

programme.title: Proof (2005)
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow and Hope Davis are superb as the daughters of a mentally unstable math genius (Anthony Hopkins) in this intelligent adaptation of David Auburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play. Jake Gyllenhaal. Directed by John Madden (“Shakespeare in Love”)(n)

programme.title: Proof (2005)
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow and Hope Davis are superb as the daughters of a mentally unstable math genius (Anthony Hopkins) in this intelligent adaptation of David Auburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play. Jake Gyllenhaal. Directed by John Madden (“Shakespeare in Love”)(n)

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs (1991)
programme.desc: Best Picture winner about an FBI trainee (Best Actress Jodie Foster), who has a knack for analyzing serial killers, and enlists the aid of an imprisoned, cannibalistic sociopath (Best Actor Anthony Hopkins) in tracking a sadistic murderer. An Oscar went to director Jonathan Demme and also Ted Tally won for Best Adapted Screenplay for his script based on the Thomas Harris novel(n)

programme.title: Getaway (2013)
programme.desc: A washed-up race-car driver speeds to rescue his kidnapped wife, enlisting the aid of a bright young hacker to accomplish his treacherous mission as his every move is monitored by remote cameras(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2 (2001)
programme.desc: A wisecracking L.A. cop (Chris Tucker) visits his friend the inspector (Jackie Chan) in Hong Kong, and is drawn into a case involving a mob bigwig and a counterfeiting ring. Chan's stunts punch up this predictable crime yarn. A sequel to 1998's “Rush Hour.” Brett Ratner directed(n)

programme.title: Corky Romano (2001)
programme.desc: A bumbling veterinarian joins the FBI so he can destroy evidence against his mob-boss father(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs (2007)
programme.desc: Robert Redford directed and stars in this talky treatise on the U.S. war on terror, intercutting the stories of a liberal professor (Redford), a hawkish U.S. senator (Tom Cruise) and a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep). Michael Pena, Andrew Garfield, Peter Berg, Kevin Dunn(n)

programme.title: Frantic (1988)
programme.desc: An American doctor becomes entangled with drug smugglers and terrorists as he hunts for his wife after she vanishes from their Paris hotel room(n)

programme.title: Galveston (2019)
programme.desc: A fading hitman knows he is living on borrowed time after a set up nearly costs his life. Now presented with the difficulty of protecting not only himself but newly-befriended prostitute Raquel, his home town of Galveston is the setting for retribution and a dangerously uncertain fate(n)

programme.title: RoboCop (1987)
programme.desc: Detroit-in the future-is crime ridden, and run by an massive company. The company have developed a huge crime fighting robot, which unfortunately develops a rather dangerous glitch. The company sees a way to get back in favour with the public when a cop called Alex Murphy is killed by a street gang. Murphy's body is reconstructed within a steel shell and named Robocop. The Robocop is very successful against criminals, and becomes a target of supervillian Boddicker(n)

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited (2007)
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's comedy stars Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody and Jason Schwartzman as brothers Francis, Peter and Jack Whitman, who, once close, haven't spoken to each other since their father's funeral a year ago. But when Francis survives a bad motorcycle crash, he is inspired to ask his siblings to join him on a train journey across India on The Darjeeling Limited train to visit their mother who lives in a convent on the foothills of the Himalayas. However, the trio ate thrown off the train after a misunderstanding involving pepper spray, and encounter cobras, crocodiles and a village funeral. But in the course of their adventures, they learn to shed their emotional luggage (symbolised by the Louis Vuitton cases they lug around) in order to re-establish a family bond again(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow (2018)
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending injury, a ballerina and her mother are facing a bleak and uncertain future. That is why she finds herself manipulated into becoming the newest recruit for Sparrow School, a secret intelligence service that trains exceptional young people like her to use their bodies and minds as weapons(n)

programme.title: Darkman (1990)
programme.desc: A scientist on the verge of a major discovery in synthetic skin is burned beyond recognition when his laboratory is demolished by an evil gang. Altered by an experimental medical procedure, the man known as Darkman assumes 'identities' to reap revenge on his assailants(n)

programme.title: Monday (2017)
programme.desc: A young drug dealer struggles with the moral implications of his work(n)

programme.title: The Thaw (2009)
programme.desc: Four ecology students are faced with an impossible decision after a deadly parasite is unleashed and they must either run for their lives or sacrifice themselves for the sake of humanity. Val Kilmer, Martha MacIsaac, Aaron Ashmore, Kyle Schmid(n)

programme.title: Ricochet (1991)
programme.desc: A cop receives lots of media attention when he nabs an infamous, sadistic killer at an amusement park. The murderer stews in jail for seven years, obsessively following the rising career of his arresting officer, who becomes a DA with a promising future, a husband, and a dad. This doesn't sit well with the vengeful convict, who after escaping from prison, puts into play a series of fiendish plots in an attempt to destroy the attorney's marriage and career..(n)

programme.title: Stakeout (1987)
programme.desc: Two Seattle detectives are assigned to watch the home of a woman in case her old boyfriend, who has just escaped from prison, shows up. At first, the detectives are bored and frustrated by the job, but meeting the object of the surveillance changes everything(n)

programme.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
programme.desc: A mute cleaning lady working in a secret U.S. government lab in 1962 befriends an otherworldly, aquatic creature who's being held there against its will. In time, she and her friends decide to help it escape from captivity(n)

programme.title: The Princess Bride (1987)
programme.desc: In the delightfully fractured tale, a grandfather reads a story about a beautiful young woman named Buttercup to his bored grandson. Then, the audience is magically transported into the tale, complete with villains, creepy creatures and a love story(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017)
programme.desc: Kingsman is faced with the challenge of operating with no home base after an evil corporation known as the Golden Circle destroys their headquarters. The elite group of spies must team up with an allied organization called Statesman to save the world(n)

programme.title: Search Party (2014)
programme.desc: Distraught over the realisation that they scared away their best friend's fiancée, hard-partying friends Evan and Jason set out on a wild journey to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary(n)

programme.title: Very Bad Things (1998)
programme.desc: A group of friends decide to give Kyle one last night of freedom before his wedding day. A bachelor party in Las Vegas sounds just the ticket. Drugs, booze and a stripper turn the party into murder and a test of friendship(n)

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's death, Batman and Wonder Woman recruit superpowered individuals to defend humanity from an otherworldly threat called Steppenwolf. Together with their new allies—Cyborg, Aquaman and the Flash—they form the Justice League(n)

programme.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
programme.desc: A mute cleaning lady working in a secret U.S. government lab in 1962 befriends an otherworldly, aquatic creature who's being held there against its will. In time, she and her friends decide to help it escape from captivity(n)

programme.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
programme.desc: A mute cleaning lady working in a secret U.S. government lab in 1962 befriends an otherworldly, aquatic creature who's being held there against its will. In time, she and her friends decide to help it escape from captivity(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us (2017)
programme.desc: Two strangers embark on a dangerous trek to safety after their chartered flight crashes on a remote snowy mountain in Utah. Along the way, the pair begin to develop feelings for each other as they try to stay alive and get back to civilization(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor (2000)
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr. is excellent as the Navy's first black diver, a position he maintained even after losing a leg. Saccharine and well-acted biopic with Robert De Niro as his hard-bitten instructor. Charlize Theron. George Tillman directed(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia (1990)
programme.desc: Heart-stopping horror yarn in which a doctor who is terrified of spiders comes to a new town only to find his patients falling victim to the offspring of a deadly tropical variety of the very species he loathes. Eight cold feelers of fear grip the doctor's heart when it dawns on him that the spiders that have caused the deaths are nesting in his barn - and it falls upon him to save the otherwise placid American small town(n)

programme.title: Bad Company (2002)
programme.desc: When CIA agents Oakes and Pope try to secure a suitcase-sized nuke from a black-market dealer, they are ambushed and Pope is killed. Desperate for the bad guys to believe that Pope is still alive, Oakes recruits Pope's long-lost twin, a petty criminal(n)

programme.title: American Made (2017)
programme.desc: In this '80s-set thriller based on a true story, airline pilot Barry Seal is recruited by the CIA to smuggle drugs and weapons abroad for the U.S. government. However, Seal gets in over his head when he becomes involved with Colombia's Medellín cartel and the Iran-contra scandal(n)

programme.title: Goodfellas (1990)
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde (2017)
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in 1989 Berlin, MI6 agent Lorraine Broughton must obtain a stolen list of Western spies while the city around her descends into chaos and revolution. In time, her pursuit leads her to uncover a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Unfriended: Dark Web (2018)
programme.desc: A group of teenagers agree to play games online, but are soon terrorised by mysterious hackers that want a newly-purchased laptop back. As the teenagers begin to investigate the mysterious contents of the laptop, the hackers take it upon themselves to get the laptop back by force(n)

programme.title: Look Away (2019)
programme.desc: A lonely 18-year-old high schooler opens up to her reflection because of the lack of support she has from family and her peers. She switches place with her supportive, but evil, twin that she discovers in the mirror's reflection, but the newfound freedom unleashes suppressed feelings(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects (1995)
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a failed heist is forced by the police to piece together events leading up to the deaths of his partners. Meanwhile, the motivations of the enigmatic criminal mastermind who planned the job remain a mystery(n)

programme.title: Catfish (2010)
programme.desc: Filmmakers Henry Joost and Ariel Schulman follow a New York-based photographer as he makes a trek to Michigan and discovers that a woman he's been romancing online appears to have omitted several startling truths about her life and her family(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled (1971)
programme.desc: Offbeat western drama in which a wounded Yankee soldier finds refuge in an isolated southern girls' school towards the end of the American Civil War. The strange visitor soon becomes the object of the young women's romantic fantasies, transforming the school into a hotbed of jealousy and sexual frustration. His manipulation of the situation results in a startling, violent conclusion to this unusual drama(n)

programme.title: Cabin Fever (2002)
programme.desc: A throwback to the horror films of the '70s, this inventive, well-crafted chiller follows a group of college friends who are threatened by a flesh-eating disease in the woods. Rider Strong, Jordan Ladd. Eli Roth directed and co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: Smilla's Sense of Snow (1997)
programme.desc: Thriller about a half-Inuit scientist (Julia Ormond) who becomes obsessed with the suspicious death of an Eskimo boy in Copenhagen. Gabriel Byrne. Tork: Richard Harris. Moritz: Robert Loggia. Elsa: Vanessa Redgrave. Based on the novel by Peter Hoeg. Directed by Bille August(n)

programme.title: The Forest (2016)
programme.desc: Set in the Aokigahara Forest, which is a place where people commit suicides, a young American woman, Sara, is in search of her twin sister, who has mysteriously disappeared in the forest. Despite the warnings from the villagers, Sara travels into the ghost-filled forest to save her sister to discover the truth while being confronted by angry and tormented souls of the dead that prey on anyone who crosses their paths(n)

programme.title: The Usual Suspects (1995)
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a failed heist is forced by the police to piece together events leading up to the deaths of his partners. Meanwhile, the motivations of the enigmatic criminal mastermind who planned the job remain a mystery(n)

programme.title: American Animals (2018)
programme.desc: Four bright and well-off college students in Kentucky plot to steal some rare books from their university's Special Collections Library in a misguided quest for personal glory. Based on a true story, the film includes interviews with the foursome who attempted the bizarre heist(n)

programme.title: The Snowman (2017)
programme.desc: Norwegian police detective Harry Hole hunts a terrifying adversary known as "the Snowman Killer." Hole and a rookie cop investigate cold cases in the hope of nabbing the killer, but they soon resort to more-desperate measures to catch their prey(n)

programme.title: Tooth Fairy (2010)
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson stars in Michael Lembeck's family fantasy comedy about a tough-guy sportsman who learns the hard way not to puncture a child's illusions. Derek Thompson is an ice hockey pro whose main tactical use is the flattening of opponents - often depriving them of a tooth or two in the process. His aggression has earned him the nickname 'Tooth Fairy', but when he unsportingly tells his girlfriend's daughter that tooth fairies don't exist in reality, he's in for a bit of a shock. Unknown to him they do - and they take great umbrage at his slight. Thompson is whipped away to Fairy Land, where he's tried for his misdemeanour and sentenced to a week's community service as a tooth fairy. Thus he sprouts wings, is furnished with an outfit completely at odds with his usual image and is given Tracy as a (none too willing) mentor. And, as the comedic misunderstandings and slapstick errors steadily mount, it's clear Thompson wasn't cut out for his new line of work(n)

He's currently, under the guidance of his manager Lane, touring a seminar for the bereaved, which has brought him to Seattle, his late wife's hometown. And it's here, at his hotel, that he bumps into Eloise Chandler, the local florist who supplies the establishment's flowers. He's clearly taken with her, but she's quite frosty towards him. Even so, he pursues her - but It soon transpires that, despite his new career, both he and she have a lot of emotional baggage that will need to be dealt with before a relationship is likely to succeed. programme.title: Predator (1987)
programme.desc: Dutch has a code of honor which he will not violate, even when his life depends on it. Paradoxically, his code of honor gives him the backbone to survive as a military special forces operative when he is sent on a covert mission to rescue another group which was sent in to assist some nefarious U.S. government plan in a Latin American country. Once there, he encounters an old army buddy who has gotten too deep in the CIA's good graces for Dutch's comfort. When he and his team go into the jungle to rescue the others, they get involved in a pitched battle with local guerillas, but they are more than capable of besting these vicious fighters. However, not long after that, they encounter signs that the equally capable men they were sent to rescue were all killed unawares and in an unusually gruesome fashion. Given their training, it should have been impossible for anyone to best all of these commando warriors. Soon, the men from Dutch's own team get picked off one by one, as they grow aware that they are up against something uncanny, not of this world, something that is hunting them for sport. Why? Because their skills make them worthy opponents for the perfectly camouflaged Predator(n)
